title: [Silverwood Garden, Gazebo]
description: Cream linen cushions striped in hues of terra cotta and sky-blue cover the benches that line the walls, save for a small doorway leading back into the garden.  The open sides of the gazebo are draped with sheer gossamer netting, through which the shadows of eager moths are visible.  A faceted crystal lamp hangs from a silver chain, the lit pillar candle within casting a warm glow over the area.  Centrally placed, a low white table painted with vines and flowers bears refreshments.

Cream linen cushions striped in hues of terra cotta and sky-blue cover the benches that line the walls, save for a small doorway leading back into the garden.  The open sides of the gazebo are draped with sheer gossamer netting, allowing sunlight in and keeping the bees out.  From a conical white ceiling, a faceted crystal lamp is suspended from a silver chain.  Centrally placed, a low white table painted with vines and flowers bears refreshments.
